mn36:12.2: The following is an excerpt of the account in [MN 26](https://suttas.hillsidehermitage.org/?q=mn26).
mn36:34.1: See [AN 9.41](https://suttas.hillsidehermitage.org/?q=an%209.41). The Buddha did not suddenly attain the jhānas; it required [diligent reflection](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=53sSOqThO2A).
